description: A radio button. Selecting a radio button de-selects all its siblings (i.e. all radio buttons within the same parent).

selection.description: The checked state of the radio button.

text.description: The label text of the radio button.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The change event for the selection property.

change:selection.description: Fired when the selection property changes.

select.description: Fired when the radio button is selected or deselected by the user.
